User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the DigMkt application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

signupDate.description: The date and time the user signed up.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Uses path-based ownership for secure data access. Includes fields such as 'email', 'name', and 'signupDate'.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user. It MUST match the Firebase Authentication UID.

firestore.reasoning: This design prioritizes user data isolation and scalable authentication. The `/users/{userId}` collection provides a dedicated space for each user, following the path-based ownership model. This allows simple and secure rules based on `request.auth.uid`. The `User` documents store core user profile information.
